title: History of the Civil War in 10 Battles, Part 21: What Became of the Men Who Wore the Blue and the Grey
description: In this epilogue episode James and Scott talk about the Union and Confederate generals whom we've gotten to know so well after the war finished. They became presidents, professors, bankrupt businessmen, assassination victims, and everything in between.
itunes:author: Scott Rank, PhD
itunes:subtitle: In this epilogue episode James and Scott talk about the Union and Confederate generals whom we've gotten to know so well after the war finished. They became presidents, professors, bankrupt businessmen, assassination victims, and everything in between.
